definition.sentence: BACKGROUND The LOLITA ( Large-scale , Object-based , Linguistic Interactor , Translator , and Analyser ) system is designed as a general purpose Natural Language Processing ( NLP ) system and has been under development at the University of Durham since 1986 .
definition.definiens: a general purpose Natural Language Processing ( NLP ) system

definition.sentence: This core platform provides two main facilities : analysis , which converts text to a logical representation of its meaning , and generation , which expresses information represented in this logical form as text .
definition.definiens: converts text to a logical representation of its meaning , and

definition.sentence: The Semantic Network The SemNet is a 100,000+ node , directed hyper-graph .
definition.definiens: a 100,000+ node , directed hyper-graph

definition.sentence: OVERVIEW LaSIE-II is a highly modularised system , made up of 9 TIPSTER-compliant modules , pictured in Figure 1 as executed interactively through the GATE Graphical Interface .
definition.definiens: a highly modularised system , made up of 9 TIPSTER-compliant modules

definition.sentence: Discourse Interpreter Adds the QLF representationtoa semanticnet , which encodesthe system'sdomain model as a hierarchy of concepts .
definition.definiens: a hierarchy of concepts

definition.sentence: GATE manages all the information about the texts that is produced by each module , and provides graphical tools for visualising that information , selecting control # 0Dow through di # 0Berent module combinations and running the IE system over sets of texts .
definition.definiens: manages all the information about the texts that is produced by each module

definition.sentence: A collocation is a habitual word combination , such as # 5Cweather a storm '' , # 5C # 0Cle a lawsuit '' , and # 5Cthe falling yen '' .

definition.sentence: Freq is the frequency of the word in the context , LogL is the log likelihood ratio between the word and the context # 5B1 # 5D .

definition.sentence: The TIME sub-type is defined as a temporal unit shorter than a full day , such as second , minute , or hour .

definition.sentence: The DATE sub-type is a temporal unit of a full day or longer .

definition.sentence: BACKGROUND UMIST’s participation in the MUC-7 NE task was conducted with a recently constructed module of a larger system whose main purpose is text categorization .
definition.definiens: text categorization

definition.sentence: The semantics field comes from lookup in a database which has information on words and phrases belonging to the categories of named entities themselves as well as to categories that occur as prefixes or suffixes of names .

definition.sentence: Information extraction in the sense of the Message Understanding Conferences has been traditionally defined as the extraction of information from a text in the form of text strings and processed text strings which are placed into slots labeled to indicate the kind of information that can fill them .

SPECIAL USAGE NOTES : defined as follows : ORG_GOVT -the government of a country , state , municipality , etc. , or government body such as a government ministry , agency , commission , or committee .

Thus , the phrases enclosed between asterisks in the following examples are allowable fills for ENT_DESCRIPTOR for Commander Bates ' plane that crashed outside of Nashville : `` an F-14A `` Tomcat '' fighter jet '' `` an F-14 from Squadron 213 '' DEFINITION : LOCATION is a task-independent object that is separate from the predefined ENTITY object .

SPECIAL USAGE NOTES : CITY -a town , city , port , suburb , or other local settlement PROVINCE -a state , province , island or similar subnational geographically or politically defined area COUNTRY -a nation , country , colony , federation of countries such as the Confederation of Independent States ( the former USSR ) , or other similar national entity REGION -an international region such as Eastern Europe , the Pacific Rim , or the Malay Archipelago WATER -a body of water such as the Atlantic Ocean or the Straits of Florida .

The ARTIFACT ENTITY assumes a scenariospecific IE task that includes sports equipment such as golf clubs ( and excludes such things as `` golf club parts '' ) and specifies where they are used in the ENT_CATEGORY slot .
definition.definiens: assumes a scenariospecific IE task that includes sports equipment such as golf clubs ( and excludes such things as `` golf club parts '' ) and specifies where they are used in the ENT_CATEGORY slot

definition.sentence: SIFT : AN INTEGRATED TE/TR EXTRACTION SYSTEM Introduction At the sentence level , the SIFT system ( “Statistics for Information From Text” ) employs a unified statistical process to map from words to semantic structures .

definition.sentence: It is a classifier model that considers all pairs of entities in a message whose types are compatible with a given relation ; for example , a Person and an Organization would suggest a possible Employee_Of .
definition.definiens: a classifier model that considers all pairs of entities in a message whose types are compatible with a given relation ; for example , a

definition.sentence: Content Features While the structural features learn general facts about the patterns in which related references occur and the text that surrounds them , the content features learn about the actual names and descriptors of entities seen to be related in the training data .
definition.definiens: the structural features learn general facts about the patterns in which related references occur and the text that surrounds them , the content features learn about the actual names and descriptors of entities seen to be related in the training data

definition.sentence: The HMM labels each word either with one of the desired classes ( e.g. , person , organization , etc. ) or with the label NOT-A-NAME ( to represent “none of the desired classes” ) .
definition.definiens: labels each word either with one of the desired classes

definition.sentence: The cross sentence model is the system component that tries to find further relations beyond those identified by the sentence-level model .

definition.sentence: NetOwl Extractor provides access to the extracted information through a flexible API , and IsoQuest used a small application program to process the documents and write the SGML output .
definition.definiens: used a small application program to process the documents and write the SGML output

definition.sentence: Although previous versions of NetOwl Extractor consisted of a software engine separate from the data configuration files , the software engine contained configuration-specific code and information .
definition.definiens: consisted of a software engine separate from the data configuration files , the software engine contained configuration-specific code and information

definition.sentence: NetOwl Extractor 3.0 includes a compiler that creates a configuration file from data source files , illustrated in Figure 2 .
definition.definiens: includes a compiler that creates a configuration file from data source files

definition.sentence: 3 Multiple Configurations NetOwl Extractor permits a single CPU process to open multiple configuration files .
Visual Extractor NetOwl Extractor provides a development graphical user interface ( GUI ) called Visual Extractor , which is implemented in Java .
definition.definiens: provides a development graphical user interface ( GUI ) called Visual Extractor , which is implemented in Java

definition.sentence: Figure 4 : Visual Extractor NAMED ENTITY CUSTOM CONFIGURATION Without modification , NetOwl Extractor’s NameTag Configuration identifies all of the types of names and phrases included in the Named Entity task specification .
definition.definiens: identifies all of the types of names and phrases included in the Named Entity task specification

definition.sentence: However , the Named Entity tag specification does contain a few significant differences to the product specification of NameTag , such as tagging numeric and temporal 5 ranges as one tag where as the NameTag Configuration breaks them into two separate tags .
For these reasons , IsoQuest created a Named Entity custom configuration based on the core NameTag Configuration .
definition.definiens: created a Named Entity custom configuration based on the core NameTag Configuration

definition.sentence: IsoQuest , a wholly-owned subsidiary of SRA International Inc. , is a leading provider of information discovery products that automatically extract , analyze , index , categorize and summarize text documents .

definition.sentence: SYSTEM ARCHITECTURE MENE consists of a set of C++ and Perl modules which forms a wrapper around an M.E. toolkit # 5B6 # 5D which computes the values of the alpha parameters of equation 2 from a pair of training # 0Cles created by MENE .

definition.sentence: The IDENT relation is symmetrical ( if A is IDENT to B , then B is IDENT to A ) , and it is transitive ( if A is IDENT to B and B is IDENT to C , then A is IDENT to C , and C is IDENT to A ) .
definition.definiens: if A is IDENT to B and B is IDENT to C , then A is IDENT to C , and

definition.sentence: The annotation of coreference is to be performed within the text delimited by the SLUG , DATE , NWORDS , PREAMBLE , TEXT , and TRAILER tags .
An extensional descriptor is an enumeration of the member ( s ) of a set by ( unique ) names .
definition.definiens: an enumeration of the member ( s ) of a set by ( unique ) names

definition.sentence: An intensional description is a predicate that is true of an entity or set of entities -that it , it characterizes or defines the members of the set : `` the prime numbers '' , `` the president of Chrysler Corporation '' .
definition.definiens: a predicate that is true of an entity or set of entities -that it

definition.sentence: The MAXimal string includes the entire maximal conjoined noun phrase .
definition.definiens: includes the entire maximal conjoined noun phrase

definition.sentence: lttok is a tokeniser which looks at the characters in the input stream and bundles them into tokens .
definition.definiens: a tokeniser which looks at the characters in the input stream and bundles them into tokens

definition.sentence: The # 0Cnal precision and recall numbers are computed by the following two formulae : Final Precision = N X i=1 w i # 03 Precision i Final Recall = N X i=1 w i # 03 Recall i where N is the number of entities in the document , and w i is the weight assigned to entity i in the document .
definition.definiens: the number of entities in the document , and

definition.sentence: CogNIAC Proper Noun Resolution CogNIAC is the most general purpose coreference resolution component of the system .
CogNIAC Common Noun Resolution Common noun coreference is an important part of coreference , but it is very di # 0Ecult to accurately resolve .
definition.definiendum: CogNIAC Common Noun Resolution Common noun coreference
definition.definiens: an important part of coreference

definition.sentence: Entities The Entities are defined as follows : An organization object consists of : organization 's name and aliases found in the text , a type slot of ORGANIZATION , one descriptor phrase , and the category of the organization : ORG_CO , ORG_GOVT , or ORG_OTHER .
definition.definiens: follows : An organization object consists of : organization 's name and aliases found in the text , a type slot of ORGANIZATION , one descriptor phrase , and the category of the organization : ORG_CO , ORG_GOVT , or ORG_OTHER

definition.sentence: A person object consists of : person 's name and aliases found in the text , a type slot of PERSON , one descriptor phrase , and the category of the person : PER_CIV or PER_MIL An artifact object consists of : artifact 's name and aliases found in the text , a type slot of ARTIFACT , one descriptor phrase , and the category of the artifact : ART_AIR , ART_LAND , or ART_WATER .
definition.definiens: consists of : person 's name and aliases found in the text , a type slot of PERSON , one descriptor phrase , and the category of the person : PER_CIV or PER_MIL An artifact object consists of : artifact 's name and aliases found in the text , a type slot of ARTIFACT , one descriptor phrase , and the category of the artifact : ART_AIR , ART_LAND , or ART_WATER

definition.sentence: Locations Locations are defined as follows : A location object consists of : locale found in the text , the country where the locale exists , and the locale type : CITY , PROVINCE , COUNTRY , REGION , AIRPORT , or UNK .
